pullRequest.title: Implement support for mapping and using Active Directory maintained immutable attributes

commit.message: Implement support for default attribute usage in Active Directory
Extend the implementation for Unique ID User Stores
Resolve binary attribute value issues in AD

beforeCommit.message: Extend the implementation for Unique ID User Stores

afterCommit.message: Resolve binary attribute value issues in AD

commit.message: Fix formatting issues and java doc comments
Add a doc comment to isBinaryUserAttribute()

nodes.bodyText: Let's re-order the parameters as username,  attribute map (name ->value), profile. It should be consistent with doSetUserClaimValues()
Let's have this like 'Not implemented for AbstractUserStoreManager, may have implementations at subclasses'

commit.message: Introduce userID variants of new process user attribute hooks
Add 'UserIdSearchFilter' property to Unique ID user stores
Replace empty string constants with StringUtils.EMPTY

nodes.bodyText: shall we refactor this?  should start with a capital and end with "."? check-in other places as well
start with a capital and end with ".", refactor in the following methods as well
